tasks.label: Build Z80Emu (WSL g++)
args: mkdir -p build && g++ -std=c++20 -g -O0 -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -I include src/main.cpp src/Bus.cpp -o build/Z80Emu

tasks.label: Build tests (WSL g++)
args: mkdir -p build && g++ -std=c++20 -g -O0 -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -I include tests/test_bus.cpp src/Bus.cpp -o build/test_bus && g++ -std=c++20 -g -O0 -Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic -I include tests/test_z80_fetch.cpp src/Bus.cpp src/Z80.cpp -o build/test_z80_fetch
